description: Returns a JSON-formatted list of information about the specified trail. Fields include information on delivery errors, Amazon SNS and Amazon S3 errors, and start and stop logging times for each trail. This operation returns trail status from a single Region. To return trail status from all Regions, you must call the operation on each Region.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: Specifies the name or the CloudTrail ARN of the trail for which you are requesting status. To get the status of a shadow trail (a replication of the trail in another Region), you must specify its ARN. The following is the format of a trail ARN: arn:aws:cloudtrail:us-east-2:123456789012:trail/MyTrail.

nested_items.name: IsLogging
nested_items.description: Whether the CloudTrail trail is currently logging Amazon Web Services API calls.

nested_items.name: LatestDeliveryError
nested_items.description: Displays any Amazon S3 error that CloudTrail encountered when attempting to deliver log files to the designated bucket. For more information, see Error Responses in the Amazon S3 API Reference.

nested_items.name: LatestNotificationError
nested_items.description: Displays any Amazon SNS error that CloudTrail encountered when attempting to send a notification. For more information about Amazon SNS errors, see the Amazon SNS Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: LatestDeliveryTime
nested_items.description: Specifies the date and time that CloudTrail last delivered log files to an account's Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: LatestNotificationTime
nested_items.description: Specifies the date and time of the most recent Amazon SNS notification that CloudTrail has written a new log file to an account's Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: StartLoggingTime
nested_items.description: Specifies the most recent date and time when CloudTrail started recording API calls for an Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: StopLoggingTime
nested_items.description: Specifies the most recent date and time when CloudTrail stopped recording API calls for an Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: LatestCloudWatchLogsDeliveryError
nested_items.description: Displays any CloudWatch Logs error that CloudTrail encountered when attempting to deliver logs to CloudWatch Logs.

nested_items.name: LatestCloudWatchLogsDeliveryTime
nested_items.description: Displays the most recent date and time when CloudTrail delivered logs to CloudWatch Logs.

nested_items.name: LatestDigestDeliveryTime
nested_items.description: Specifies the date and time that CloudTrail last delivered a digest file to an account's Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: LatestDigestDeliveryError
nested_items.description: Displays any Amazon S3 error that CloudTrail encountered when attempting to deliver a digest file to the designated bucket. For more information, see Error Responses in the Amazon S3 API Reference.

nested_items.name: LatestDeliveryAttemptTime
nested_items.description: This field is no longer in use.

nested_items.name: LatestNotificationAttemptTime
nested_items.description: This field is no longer in use.

nested_items.name: LatestNotificationAttemptSucceeded
nested_items.description: This field is no longer in use.

nested_items.name: LatestDeliveryAttemptSucceeded
nested_items.description: This field is no longer in use.

nested_items.name: TimeLoggingStarted
nested_items.description: This field is no longer in use.

nested_items.name: TimeLoggingStopped
nested_items.description: This field is no longer in use.
